column5: Planning on getting a Calcutta te dc to start float fishing but was wondering in the colder months will the spool freeze up a little and stop it from free spooling. Would like some input on this before I go pick up the reel
All about line selection. Power pro will not free spool for me in sub zero.
In the below zero temps you'll wanna stick with mono over braid.
I have never had a problem with freeze up at the reel. Freeze up at the guides is another matter. Stick with mono as stated above.

braid would make for a bummer of a day in anything cold for sure.  hahaha. stick with a high quality monofilament like siglon v and you'll have no trouble with a baitcaster as long as you're not fishing ditches.
